DOC.brief_summary: Forward-looking troop established(constituted) by the patients having been included in the study " PADIS EP ", PHRC on 2006 and 2009, randomized checked(controlled), double-blind, comparing an anticoagulating treatment(processing) extended by coumadine versus placebo during 18 months at patients having had a first episode of EP idiopathique treated(handled) initially 6 months by anti-vitamin K.
DOC.brief_title: Determine the Frequency of a HTPPE in 5 Years (Â± on 1 Year) After a First Episode of Idiopathic Pulmonary Embolism.
DOC.criteria: Patients having ended the study PADIS EP after the visit of the end of study and having signed the consent HTP. Refusal to grant in writing to participate in the study PADIS HTP
